meanings.definition: Relating to radiology or the use of radiation in medical imaging.
meanings.sent1: The radiologic report showed detailed images of the patient's bones.
meanings.sent2: The radiologic technician carefully positioned the X-ray machine for the scan.
meanings.sent3: The radiologic film accidentally got mixed up with the holiday photos.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a radiologic image, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The radiologic description painted a clear picture of the internal organs.

meanings.definition: Involving the use of X-rays or other forms of radiation for diagnostic or therapeutic purposes.
meanings.sent1: The radiologic department was busy with patients needing X-ray scans.
meanings.sent2: Radiologic treatment helped shrink the tumor without surgery.
meanings.sent3: The radiologic machine beeped rhythmically during the procedure.
meanings.sent4: His words had a radiologic effect on her, penetrating deep into her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The radiologic approach provided a non-invasive way to examine the injury.
